channel.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
channel.description:
K, so The Might Hutch was invited to the pre release of CoD Black Ops and recorded 2 game types, The gun game and team death.
I honestly this games gonna suck, like mw2, but fuck it. I'm still gonna buy it.
Team death part 1 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VuOJvNJmqc
team death part 2 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n9m4U93ChNI
gun game part 1 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B1pkxOxnZHo
gun game part 2 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S8llsUfsgT8
confirmed perks and weapons http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GxikvIRDAWU
killstreaks (fuck these there so terrible. another fail CoD because of killstreaks) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nO2naNNYFJQ
More info I got out of it was that... stopping power was removed there is the jump/dive shit everyones all excited about, but its not that great the r.c car is fucking stupid

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I mean that the likelihood of them producing a game which is less entertaining than MW2 (which was an incredible success) almost amounts to impossibility, because for them, the only way is up. Any other way is not what they’re paid for.

It’s all in the eye of the beholder, of course. Some people will like it, some people won’t - that’s just the way it is with everything. I think it’s safe to say it’ll be another massive, global hit, though, and that it’ll generally be approved of by the consumers.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:13, topic:358397”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=454904.msg3331132#msg3331132 date=1283478188]
the videos before mw2 came out looked real good too. look how it turned out… ya never know till you play it, but still. it looks disappointing.
[/quote]

I think MW2’s brilliant. The consensus that it sucks seems to only be amid < COD4 vets. How disappointing, though? To be honest, I don’t think it’s possible for them to fuck up. Some of the world’s greatest game designers work for the companies involved, so it’d be nearly impossible for the game to be less qualitative than MW2. Whether it’ll be a step up or not is unpredictable of course, but I very seriously doubt it’ll be a step down.[/quote]i laughed at that haha. idk if u meant it like that but it looks like you were saying mw2 couldnt possibly get worse and i agreeeee…

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

ChaosPkers:

the videos before mw2 came out looked real good too. look how it turned out… ya never know till you play it, but still. it looks disappointing.

I think MW2’s brilliant. The consensus that it sucks seems to only be amid < COD4 vets. How disappointing, though? To be honest, I don’t think it’s possible for them to fuck up. Some of the world’s greatest game designers work for the companies involved, so it’d be nearly impossible for the game to be less qualitative than MW2. Whether it’ll be a step up or not is unpredictable of course, but I very seriously doubt it’ll be a step down.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops

item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I watched the trailer on my xbox and it looked exactly the same as MW2 with a couple of new weapons, my brother said the same and he’s just got 10th prestige so he plays a lot. Call of Duty’s are all the same, that’s why I play Bad Company 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

I’m still not a fan of having the computer getting kills for you. Kill streaks like the chopper gunner where you just shoot somewhat in their direction and get a kill is retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:5, topic:358397”]I really hate killstreaks… they’re just a cheap way of stacking up kills. They ruin Call of Duty in my opinion.[/quote]Well Treyarch made them stop stacking onto your killstreak, so people will actually have to work for killstreaks.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:5, topic:358397”]I really hate killstreaks… they’re just a cheap way of stacking up kills. They ruin Call of Duty in my opinion.[/quote]100% agreed. the thing that makes me rage quit everytime in mw2 is either bullet lag bull shit or a harrier or chopper gunner that wont even let me spawn

I Br3ndan I:

I don’t see how any of these videos give the impression that COD: BO is going to be a failure of a game. I never played COD4 online, but I’ve watched some videos, and COD: BO looks as though it’s retracing its footsteps and trying to retain the feel COD4 had. I think that’s what the COD community’s been crying out for.

the videos before mw2 came out looked real good too. look how it turned out… ya never know till you play it, but still. it looks disappointing.

Read full topic

I don’t see how any of these videos give the impression that COD: BO is going to be a failure of a game. I never played COD4 online, but I’ve watched some videos, and COD: BO looks as though it’s retracing its footsteps and trying to retain the feel COD4 had. I think that’s what the COD community’s been crying out for.

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:2, topic:358397”]I personally can’t wait for this game. Treyarch is actually listening to the community, unlike IW, so I’m expecting to see a lot more positive feelings toward the game.

Also, I completely lol’d when I saw an ACOG attachment for a pistol, but was ecstatic when I saw dual-wield skorpions.[/quote]still i dont like the idea of the kill streaks… again its obvious there gonna be a problem. but of course a bunch of kids think its such a great idea… :\

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I personally can’t wait for this game. Treyarch is actually listening to the community, unlike IW, so I’m expecting to see a lot more positive feelings toward the game.

Also, I completely lol’d when I saw an ACOG attachment for a pistol, but was ecstatic when I saw dual-wield skorpions.

Read full topic
